main.title: Confused about gym routines? Simplify with nFitnity’s expert guidance!
main.info_1:
Craft your personal workout plan in just
5 minutes with nFitnity! Master every move with our step-by-step text and video guides.
main.info_2: Embrace a smarter way to stay fit. Save up to 100 times on your fitness expenses compared to average personal trainer costs
main.info_3: Start your risk-free journey today with our 14-day money-back guarantee. Transform your fitness experience now!

cards.instruction_text: Comprehensive and easy-to-follow text instructions for each exercise, ensuring clarity and understanding, suitable for all fitness levels.
cards.video_text: Engaging and instructional videos accompanying each exercise, demonstrating proper techniques to maximize effectiveness and minimize injury risks.
cards.library_text: A rich database with a wide variety of exercises, catering to different fitness goals and preferences, suitable for all ages and abilities.
cards.tracking_text: An intuitive feature to monitor your fitness journey, track progress, and celebrate milestones, keeping you motivated and on track.
cards.plan_text: Customizable workout programs tailored to individual goals, fitness levels, and health considerations, ensuring a personalized fitness journey.
cards.design_text: An intuitively designed interface that caters to the ergonomic and visual needs of older adults, ensuring ease of use without compromising sophistication.

main.app_text: Create your workout program effortlessly in just 5 minutes. It’s sooooo simple, anyone can do it! Money-back guarantee. Risk-free!
main.guide_1: 1. Register: Let’s Get Acquainted before we start
main.guide_2: 2. Answer a few questions: Share a bit about yourself and your fitness goals so we can tailor your journey.
main.guide_3: 3. Schedule Your Sessions: Pick the days and times that fit seamlessly into your life.
main.guide_4: 4. Await the Magic: Sit back and watch as our advanced AI weaves together the perfect workout plan for you, like magic!
main.guide_5: 5. Ready to Roll! Everything’s set: Your personalized fitness plan awaits. Let’s embark on this health journey together!

advantages.solution_text: nFitnity offers all the benefits of a personal trainer at a fraction of the cost, making fitness accessible and affordable
advantages.intensity_text: Tailor your workout program’s length and intensity to match your personal fitness level and goals, ensuring a comfortable yet challenging experience
advantages.approach_text: Each workout is designed not just for physical fitness but also to enhance overall health, particularly catering to the needs of senior users

informs.text_1: nFitnity’s resistance training is key in maintaining and improving bone density, crucial for seniors to prevent osteoporosis and related injuries.
informs.text_2: nFitnity’s resistance training is key in maintaining and improving bone density, crucial for seniors to prevent osteoporosis and related injuries.
informs.text_3: By focusing on exercises that improve joint flexibility and balance, nFitnity helps users move more freely and swiftly, contributing to better quality of life and independence.
informs.text_4: Research demonstrates that high-intensity resistance training approach can significantly enhance movement speed. In a study with elderly participants, just 8 weeks of training led to a 174% increase in muscle strength and a notable 48% boost in walking speed, greatly improving mobility and agility.
informs.text_5: Addressing the concern that 5% of deaths are due to insufficient physical activity, nFitnity encourages a more active lifestyle to reduce this risk.
informs.text_6: Regular exercise with nFitnity combats the risks linked to physical inactivity, which accounts for 20% of fatal illnesses, including some types of cancer.

main.inform_button: Discover My Free Week of Wellness!
